headline: How Recent Developments Are Shaping the Medtronic Investment Story
summary: Medtronic's fair value estimate has nudged higher to $111.05 from $109.82 as analysts grow more confident that the company can sustain mid single digit plus organic growth. A slightly lower discount rate and largely unchanged revenue growth outlook reflect a market that is increasingly willing to recognize the durability of Medtronic's cash flow narrative, while still acknowledging execution risks. Read on to see how this evolving Wall Street debate may help investors stay informed about...
